actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."card_allocation" SET
		"card_number" = '{{update_form.fieldState.card_number.isVisible ? update_form.formData.card_number : update_form.sourceData.card_number}}',
		"allocation_date" = '{{update_form.fieldState.allocation_date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.allocation_date : update_form.sourceData.allocation_date}}',
    "user_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.user_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.user_id : update_form.sourceData.user_id}}',
		"allocation_expiry" = '{{update_form.fieldState.allocation_expiry.isVisible ? update_form.formData.allocation_expiry : update_form.sourceData.allocation_expiry}}',
		"is_active" = '{{update_form.fieldState.is_active.isVisible ? update_form.formData.is_active : update_form.sourceData.is_active}}',
		"deactivation_time" = '{{update_form.fieldState.deactivation_time.isVisible ? update_form.formData.deactivation_time : update_form.sourceData.deactivation_time}}',
		"allocated_points" = '{{update_form.fieldState.allocated_points.isVisible ? update_form.formData.allocated_points : update_form.sourceData.allocated_points}}'
WHERE "allocation_id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.allocation_id}};
